name: Cruzr Gay Chat
description: Download CRUZR TVs companion app to browse and chat to hot guys streaming LIVE on CRUZR TV!  CRUZR offers all the great features of a traditional gay dating app as well as letting you connect LIVE and interact with featured guys on our TV Channel.   Want to meet guys near you? Just use your GPS location to instantly see whos around, or search for cities around the globe using Map Search  The app is free to download and use, and is enhanced with optional extra features that you can upgrade to access.   Free features include: * Free to create your profile  * Add photos, video & voice clips to your profile * Send private video with members * Exchange private photos with members * Free push notifications  * Sign up for live 121 voice calls and messaging  * Create a Hotlist  * Block/Report  You must be 18yrs and over to use CRUZR. No nudity or adult content allowed.  http://www.twitter.com/cruzr_tv
